name: @wpgraphql/wp-graphql-smart-cache
description: Smart Caching & Cache Invalidation for WPGraphQL

scripts.test:codecept: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-smart-cache/ -- vendor/bin/codecept
scripts.test:codecept:wpunit: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-smart-cache/ -- vendor/bin/codecept run wpunit
scripts.test:codecept:acceptance: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-smart-cache/ -- bash -c 'TEST_SITE_WP_URL=http://tests-wordpress vendor/bin/codecept run acceptance "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:functional: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-smart-cache/ -- bash -c 'TEST_SITE_WP_URL=http://tests-wordpress vendor/bin/codecept run functional "$@"' --
